name: Helpfulness Assessment
description: Evaluates how helpful and useful the assistant's responses are to the user

relevance.name: Response Relevance
relevance.description: How well the assistant's responses address the user's questions or needs

criteria.1: Responses are completely off-topic or irrelevant
criteria.2: Responses are somewhat related but miss key points
criteria.3: Responses address the topic but lack depth or miss some aspects
criteria.4: Responses are relevant and address most aspects of the user's needs
criteria.5: Responses are highly relevant and comprehensively address all user needs

completeness.name: Response Completeness
completeness.description: Whether the assistant provides complete and thorough answers

criteria.1: Responses are incomplete or leave major questions unanswered
criteria.2: Responses provide basic information but lack important details
criteria.3: Responses are reasonably complete but could include more detail
criteria.4: Responses are thorough and include most necessary information
criteria.5: Responses are comprehensive and include all relevant details

actionability.name: Actionable Guidance
actionability.description: How well the assistant provides practical, actionable advice or information

criteria.1: Responses provide no actionable guidance or next steps
criteria.2: Responses mention actions but are vague or impractical
criteria.3: Responses provide some actionable guidance but could be clearer
criteria.4: Responses provide clear, practical guidance that users can follow
criteria.5: Responses provide excellent, specific, actionable guidance with clear steps
